resources.string:
Revibes was founded by Carissa Handrian, an aspiring sustainability activist, in 2023.
The name Revibes originates from 3 goals: Redefining what it means to raise awareness,
Revolutionizing the methods of activity,
and Reaching as far as possible.

We aim to increase the levels of awareness of Societal and Environmental problems not just in Indonesia, but internationally as well.\nTo aid in this, we collaborate with other likeminded NGOs and communities.

Within the bold R, a globe icon is incorporated. This globe represents the global reach and impact of RevibeS, as well as our commitment to making sure that the problems that we are tackling go acknowledged on not just a local scale, but a global one. The Globe serves as a reminder that positive vibes can extend worldwide to promote a green and sustainable future.
The word “vibe” is written in a simple, lowercase, and basic font. This choice reflects the brand’s approachability and connection with individuals.

The final element, the letter “S,” is designed as a graphic arrowhead pointing upward. This graphic element, colored in a vibrant blue shade, represents progress, positivity, and the upward trajectory of sustainable development.
